Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16616792]MHV(murine hepatitis virus):inhibition of virus infection in L2 cells(98% inhibition at 30 Μm, IC50=4 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.16616792]No cytotoxic at a concentration of 30 μM on L2cells
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: inhibits viral entry through coiled coil interactions.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of severe acute respiratory syndrome-associated coronavirus (SARS-CoV) infectivity by peptides analogous to the viral spike protein.
Literature.Author: Sainz B Jr, Mossel EC, Gallaher WR, Wimley WC, Peters CJ, Wilson RB, Garry RF.
